title: Monday with Matt & J: Addressing Outrage Culture
description: The Dooley's are coming atcha for another episode of Monday's with Matt and J. Tune into this episode as they challenge "outrage culture" and provide you with some ideas on how to face it when you inevitably encounter it online (or IRL).
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
content:encoded: The Dooley's are coming atcha for another episode of Monday's with Matt and J. Tune into this episode as they challenge "outrage culture" and provide you with some ideas on how to face it when you inevitably encounter it online (or IRL).
